subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jason Isringhausen, who closed out the game in the tenth inning, became the third pitcher, along with Billy Wagner and John Franco, to record his 300th save as a member of the Mets.
snippet: Jason Isringhausen, who closed out the game in the tenth inning, became the third pitcher, along with Billy Wagner and John Franco, to record his 300th save as a member of the Mets.
